title: Bug 50598Sample build.xml uses wrong manager.url
description: Inhttp://tomcat.apache.org/tomcat7.0doc/appdev/build.xml.txt , referenced from http://tomcat.apache.org/tomcat7.0doc/appdev/processes.htmlsample manager.url is given as "http://localhost:8080/manager" but should be "http://localhost:8080/manager/text"
